thread.title: PatB

author: PatB
title: PatB
text: I was invited to a 40th birthday party in Lanzarote at very short notice and a lot of the hotels were busy as it was over the St Patrick's day weekend. I found a great hotel on Amoma with 4 swimming pools and scenic lifts. I had a lovely room on the ground floor which at first I wasn't too sure about but I had a huge bathroom and a terrace overlooking the swimming pools and gardens. I was even given a bottle of sparkling wine and two plates of fresh fruit as a welcome gift. Fabulous!
